error.description: Please try again. If this happens again, please leave us a message. That way, we can fix this issue.

conceptTreeList.noTreesExplanation: Probably due to a network issue. Please try to refresh.

queryRunner.errorDates: Invalid: all date ranges excluded from time calculation
queryRunner.resultError: Could not load the query result.

queryEditor.couldNotInsertConceptList: Could not insert the Concept List
queryEditor.secondaryIdTooltip: Additional links between the concepts can be determined here. By default, the link is made on the entity level. If another option is selected the link will be additionally made on it.

expandPreviousQueryModal.headline: Are you sure to expand the query?
expandPreviousQueryModal.description: When you click expand, all concepts within the editor will be replaced by the content from within the expanded query.

dropzone.explanation: You'll create a query in this area
dropzone.dropIntoThisArea: Drop one of the following to get started

datasetSelector.label: Datasets
datasetSelector.disabled: Can't change the dataset at the moment.

queryNodeEditor.selectAFilter: Select a filter to see its description here.

deletePreviousQueryFolderModal.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
deletePreviousQueryFolderModal.description: All queries from the folder {{folder}} will be removed from the folder, but will remain stored.

sharePreviousQueryModal.headline: Edit sharing
sharePreviousQueryModal.groupsLabel: Groups to share the query with
sharePreviousQueryModal.groupsLabelQuery: Groups to share the query with
sharePreviousQueryModal.groupsLabelConfig: Groups to share the form config with

formValidation.invalidDateRange: End date is smaller than start date

default.conceptDropzoneLabel: Add a concept or a concept list
default.conceptColumnDropzoneLabel: Add a concept or a concept list
default.dropBetweenLabel: Add a concept or a concept list. Click here to cancel

uploadQueryResultsModal.headline: Upload result list
uploadQueryResultsModal.uploadFailed: Could not upload file. Please check the file format and the network connection.
uploadQueryResultsModal.uploadSucceeded_one: All lines (1 line) were successfully uploaded.

formatInfo.text: File should contain one result per row, separated by ; (semicolon)

csvColumnPicker.unreadableDate_one: Couldn't read the date for the following line
csvColumnPicker.unreadableDate_other: Couldn't read the date for the following {{count}} lines
csvColumnPicker.unresolvedId_one: Couldn't resolve ID for the following line
csvColumnPicker.unresolvedId_other: Couldn't resolve ID for the following {{count}} lines

uploadConceptListModal.headline: Upload concepts
uploadConceptListModal.label: Name of the concept
uploadConceptListModal.selectConceptRootNode: Resolve as a concept list or as a filter list
uploadConceptListModal.error: An error occurred when resolving the values.

authorization.unauthorized: Authentitcation failed. An authentication token is missing or expired

preview.headline: Results preview
preview.statisticsSubline: Based on the full results. Missing number values interpreted as 0.

login.headline: Queries and Analyses
login.error: Login failed. Please check user name and password.

addFolderModal.headline: Add folder
addFolderModal.description: The folder is created temporarily at first. Once there's a query within the folder, the folder will be saved permanently.

help.tabConceptTrees: Select concepts from concepts trees and use them in the Editor and Form Editor
help.tabPreviousQueries: Select previous queries and use them in the Editor, Timebased Editor and Form Editor. Select stored forms and use them in the Form Editor.
help.tabQueryEditor: In the Editor, a query may be built and sent.
help.tabTimebasedEditor: In the Timebased Editor, a time-based query may be built and sent. That means, previous queries may be combined using time based relations, such as 'before' and 'after'.
help.tabFormEditor: The Form Editor allows for further analysis and statistics of previous queries.
help.datasetSelector: Select the dataset â€“ concept trees, previous queries and forms will be loaded.
help.excludeTimestamps: If selected, will avoid using the date values from this concept within a query.
help.excludeFromSecondaryId: If selected, will avoid using this concept in the analysis layer, should an analysis layer be selected.
help.queryEditorExclude: If selected, will return results which do not include the concepts from this column.
help.queryEditorDate: Select a date range for the concepts of this column.
help.editorDropzoneAnd: Drop concepts here to connect them logically via AND. Click to select a concept list.
help.editorDropzoneOr: Drop concepts here to connect them logically via OR. Click to select a concept list.

emptyTimeline.headline: History
emptyTimeline.descriptionWithoutIds: To get started, import IDs into the empty list on the left side.
emptyTimeline.descriptionWithoutId: Select an ID from the list on the left side
emptyTimeline.descriptionWithId: Couldn't find any data for this ID.

history.backButtonWarning: Note: changes will be discarded. Please download the list before going back.
history.error: Couldn't load history for this ID.

settings.headline: History session settings
settings.selectStatusTooltip: Set possible status values, that may be assigned to individual entites during the history session.

load.importDescription:
Please provide aa CSV format with columns
ID kind;ID (+ optionally: ;status 1;status 2;...)
load.error: Couldn't load history for this file.

importModal.headline: Import codes
importModal.subtitle: Please paste the data into the text area below, one code per line.
